about_the_game:
Welcome to Mini Tank Mayhem, where strategy and chaos collide! Jump into an intense blend of Deckbuilder, tower defense, and roguelike action. Take the wheel of your mini-tank and defend Earth from relentless alien swarms using a deck of powerful cards, crafty module upgrades, and tons of artifacts.

Build devastating strategies with hundreds of unique cards. Each battle lets you try out jaw-dropping combos that can overwhelm any foe. Every time you play, you’ll shape a different deck, try fresh strategies, and tackle brand-new challenges.

Find artifacts that completely change your approach. With so many to choose from, you’ll keep adapting your tactics run after run. 

  • Tower Defense Meets Card Strategy : Defend Earth in a game that combines the best parts of card collecting, roguelike exploration, and tower defense. Gather cards from battles, unlock artifacts, and face off against towering bosses!

  • Heroes with a Flair for Mayhem : Pick a commander with special skills and a unique deck. Level them up to gain powerful abilities and turn the tide on the battlefield.

  • Unleash Endless Deck Possibilities : Choose your cards wisely and explore limitless combinations. With hundreds of cards available, forge devastating strategies and craft exquisite decks.

  • Diverse Types of Card : Discover an array of card types—tanks, upgrade modules, and skill cards. Each tank brings distinct attributes like damage type, attack power, range and cool effect. 

  • Discover Powerful Artifacts :Hunt down artifacts that give your deck impressive boosts. Each playthrough presents different artifacts to mix up your strategy and keep things fresh.

  • Roguelike Adventures with Endless Variety : Every run unfolds differently. You’ll encounter unpredictable alien waves, stumble across random events, and battle fierce bosses.

  • Prepare for the Final Showdown : Spend crystals on new cards or artifacts, drop any that aren’t working and patch up your base. Every decision matters as you gear up to face the Prime Invader in one epic final battle!

name: Mini Tank Mayhem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-3337U or AMD A6-5200 (~2GHz Processor or higher)
  • Memory: 2048 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720 / AMD Radeon HD 6570 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G (~3GHz+ or better)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/ AMD Radeon RX 580 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Defend Earth from aliens in Mini Tank Mayhem, a roguelike deck-building tower defense game! Command your experimental tank, collect rare cards, craft unique decks, and unleash devastating combos to protect the rift between Earth.
